resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

title.name: title
title.description: Meeting title. The title can be a maximum of 128 characters long.
title.ai_hint: Meeting title. The title can be a maximum of 128 characters long.

start.name: start
start.description: Date and time for the start of the meeting. Acceptable format.
start.ai_hint: Date and time for the start of the meeting. Acceptable format.

end.name: end
end.description: Date and time for the end of the meeting. Acceptable format.
end.ai_hint: Date and time for the end of the meeting. Acceptable format.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

values.name: text
values.description: Text to display. A subset of markdown is supported (https://aka.ms/ACTextFeatures).

values.name: color
values.description: Color of the TextBlock element

values.name: fontType
values.description: Type of font to use for rendering

values.name: horizontalAlignment
values.description: Controls the horizontal text alignment

values.name: isSubtle
values.description: Whether to display text slightly toned down to appear less prominent

values.name: maxLines
values.description: Specifies the maximum number of lines to display

values.name: size
values.description: Controls size of text

values.name: weight
values.description: Controls the weight of TextBlock elements

values.name: wrap
values.description: Whether to allow text to wrap. Otherwise, text is clipped.

values.name: height
values.description: Specifies the height of the element

values.name: separator
values.description: Whether to draw a separating line at the top of the element

values.name: spacing
values.description: Controls the amount of spacing between this element and the preceding element

values.name: id
values.description: A unique identifier associated with the item

values.name: isVisible
values.description: Whether this item will be removed from the visual trees

values.name: id
values.description: Unique identifier for the value. Used to identify collected input when the Submit action is performed.

values.name: isMultiline
values.description: Whether to allow multiple lines of input

values.name: maxLength
values.description: Hint of maximum length characters to collect (may be ignored by some clients)

values.name: placeholder
values.description: Description of the input desired. Displayed when no text has been input.

values.name: regex
values.description: Regular expression indicating the required format of this text input

values.name: style
values.description: Style hint for text input

values.name: value
values.description: The initial value for this field

values.name: url
values.description: The URL to open

values.name: data
values.description: Any extra data to pass along. These are essentially ‘hidden’ properties.

values.name: verb
values.description: The card author-defined verb associated with this action

values.name: title
values.description: Label for button or link that represents this action

values.name: iconUrl
values.description: Optional icon to be shown on the action in conjunction with the title. Supports data URI in version 1.2+.

values.name: style
values.description: Controls the style of an Action, which influences how the action is displayed, spoken, etc

values.name: binaryPropertyName
values.description: The field in the node input containing the binary file data

values.name: url
values.description: The public URL of the file

options.name: markdown
options.description: The message in markdown format. When used the text parameter is used to provide alternate text for UI clients that do not support rich text.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

options.name: options
hostEmail
options.description: Email address for the meeting host. This parameter is only used if the user or application calling the API has the admin-level scopes.

options.name: password
options.description: Meeting password. It's required when the meeting is protected by a password and the current user is not privileged to view it if they are not a host, co-host or invitee of the meeting.

options.name: sendEmail
options.description: Whether or not to send emails to host and invitees. It is an optional field and default value is true.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: before
options.description: List messages sent before a date and time

options.name: beforeMessage
options.description: List messages sent before a message, by ID

options.name: parentId
options.description: List messages with a parent, by ID

options.name: mentionedPeople
options.description: List only messages with certain person mentioned. Enter their ID. You can use 'me' as a shorthand for yourself

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: agenda
options.description: The meeting's agenda. Cannot be longer that 1300 characters.

options.displayName: Allow Any User To Be Co-Host
options.name: allowAnyUserToBeCoHost
options.description: Whether or not to allow any attendee with a host account on the target site to become a co-host when joining the meeting

options.name: allowAuthenticatedDevices
options.description: Whether or not to allow authenticated video devices in the meeting's organization to start or join the meeting without a prompt

options.displayName: Allow First User To Be Co-Host
options.name: allowFirstUserToBeCoHost
options.description: Whether or not to allow the first attendee of the meeting with a host account on the target site to become a co-host

options.name: enableConnectAudioBeforeHost
options.description: Whether or not to allow any attendee to connect audio in the meeting before the host joins the meeting

options.name: enabledAutoRecordMeeting
options.description: Whether or not meeting is recorded automatically

options.name: enabledJoinBeforeHost
options.description: Whether or not to allow any attendee to join the meeting before the host joins the meeting

options.name: end
options.description: Date and time for the end of the meeting. Acceptable format.

options.name: excludePassword
options.description: Whether or not to exclude password from the meeting email invitation

options.name: hostEmail
options.description: Email address for the meeting host. This attribute should only be set if the user or application calling the API has the admin-level scopes.

values.name: email
values.description: Email address of meeting invitee

values.name: displayName
values.description: Display name of meeting invitee

values.name: coHost
values.description: Whether or not invitee is allowed to be a co-host for the meeting

options.name: joinBeforeHostMinutes
options.description: The number of minutes an attendee can join the meeting before the meeting start time and the host joins

options.name: password
options.description: Meeting password. Must conform to the site's password complexity settings. If not specified, a random password conforming to the site's password rules will be generated automatically

options.name: publicMeeting
options.description: Whether or not to allow the meeting to be listed on the public calendar

options.name: recurrence
options.description: Meeting series recurrence rule (conforming with RFC 2445), applying only to meeting series

options.name: requireRegistrationInfo
options.description: Data required for meeting registration

options.name: reminderTime
options.description: The number of minutes before the meeting begins, for sending an email reminder to the host

options.name: sendEmail
options.description: Whether or not to send emails to host and invitees. It is an optional field and default value is true.

options.name: siteUrl
options.description: URL of the Webex site which the meeting is created on. If not specified, the meeting is created on user's preferred site. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: start
options.description: Date and time for the start of the meeting. Acceptable format.

options.name: title
options.description: Meeting title

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

destination.name: destination
destination.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

roomId.name: roomId
roomId.description: List messages in a room, by ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
roomId.ai_hint: List messages in a room, by ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

specifyPersonBy.name: specifyPersonBy
specifyPersonBy.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.description: ID of the message to update
messageId.ai_hint: ID of the message to update

markdownText.name: markdownText
markdownText.description: The message, in Markdown format. The maximum message length is 7439 bytes.
markdownText.ai_hint: The message, in Markdown format. The maximum message length is 7439 bytes.

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'meeting' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'meeting' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'meeting' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'start'
IF resource == 'meeting' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'end'
IF resource == 'meeting' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'meeting' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'meetingId'
IF resource == 'meeting' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'meeting' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'meetingId'
IF resource == 'meeting' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'meeting' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'meeting' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'meeting' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'meeting' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'meetingId'
IF resource == 'meeting' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'message' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'destination'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'create' AND destination == 'room' THEN SHOW parameter 'roomId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'create' AND destination == 'person' THEN SHOW parameter 'specifyPersonBy'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'create' AND specifyPersonBy == 'id' THEN SHOW parameter 'toPersonId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'create' AND specifyPersonBy == 'email' THEN SHOW parameter 'toPersonEmail'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'color'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'fontType'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'horizontalAlignment'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'isSubtle'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'maxLines'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'size'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'weight'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'wrap'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'height'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'separator'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'spacing'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF type == 'textBlock' THEN SHOW parameter 'isVisible'
IF type == 'inputText' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF type == 'inputText' THEN SHOW parameter 'isMultiline'
IF type == 'inputText' THEN SHOW parameter 'maxLength'
IF type == 'inputText' THEN SHOW parameter 'placeholder'
IF type == 'inputText' THEN SHOW parameter 'regex'
IF type == 'inputText' THEN SHOW parameter 'style'
IF type == 'inputText' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF type == 'openUrl' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF type IN ["submit", "execute"] THEN SHOW parameter 'data'
IF type == 'execute' THEN SHOW parameter 'verb'
IF fileLocation == 'binaryData' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF fileLocation == 'url' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'roomId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'messageId'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'markdown'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' AND markdown == False THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF resource == 'message' AND operation == 'update' AND markdown == True THEN SHOW parameter 'markdownText'
